meanings.sent1: After the paper ripped, I had to repaste it together.
meanings.sent2: She decided to repaste the torn poster on the wall.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally repasted the wrong sides together, oops!
meanings.sent4: The chef had to repaste the edges of the pie crust to seal it properly.
meanings.sent5: Remember to repaste the label on the jar to keep it secure.

meanings.sent1: The student had to repaste the torn corner of the project.
meanings.sent2: He carefully repasted the loose wallpaper back onto the wall.
meanings.sent3: She repasted the paper mache balloon with extra glue for strength.
meanings.sent4: The artist had to repaste the layers of paper to create a collage.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to repaste the stamp on the envelope before sending it.
